name: Quan Li
content: Quan Li@ShanghaiTech Office: Room 1A-404B, SIST liquan[at]shanghaitech[dot]edu[dot]cn Tel: (021) 2068 4425 Publications Courses Students Services RECENT NEWS Oct 2025: Received VISxGenAI Challenge Honorable Mention at IEEE VIS 2025 Workshop! Congrat to Junjie. Oct 2025: One full paper was accepted by ICHEC 2025 (Chinese CHI 2025). Congrat to Yuchen, Shizhen, Shengxi, and Ouyang. Oct 2025: Received Wiley China Excellent Author Program Certificate, Jan. - Mar. 2025. Sep 2025: Received a TVCG Reviewer Certificate (2024). August 2025: FashionCook paper was finally accepted by IEEE CG&A 2025. Congrat to Yuheng. August 2025: One demo paper was accepted by ACM UIST 2025. Congrat to Longfei and Shenghan. June/July 2025: One full paper was accepted by IEEE VIS 2025. One short paper was accepted by IEEE VIS 2025. Two full papers were accepted by ACM UIST 2025. Congrat to Haoran, Ouyang, Shaohan, Shenxin and Shizheng. May 2025: One full paper ASight: Fine-tuning Auto-Scheduling Optimizations for Model Deployment via Visual Analytics was accepted by TVCG 2025. Congrat to Laixin, Ruofei, and NetEase Game. Mar. 2025: ClueCart paper received ACM CHI 2025 Best Paper Award. Congrat to Xiyuan and Junjie. Mar. 2025: One paper about Influence Maximization in Temporal Social Networks with a Cold-start Problem was accepted by ICWSM 2025. Congrat to Laixin, Xiyuan, Shenghan, Prof. Haipeng Zhang and NetEase Games. Feb. 2025: Two papers about Designing a Probe for Oral Case Presentation Training with LLM Assistance and Enabling Asynchronous Co-viewing Experiences in Virtual Reality via Danmaku were accepted by CHI 2025 LBW. Congrat to Ouyang and Xiaofeng. Feb. 2025: One paper about Exploring Contextual Support for Digesting Academic Paper Reviews was accepted by CSCW 2025. Congrat to Yuansong, Shuhao, and Shaohan. Feb. 2025: One paper From Requirement to Solution: Unveiling Problem-Driven Design Patterns in Visual Analytics was accepted by TVCG 2025. Congrat to Yuchen, Shenghan, Shizhen, and Xiaofeng. Jan. 2025: One paper MetapathVis: Inspecting the Effect of Metapath in HeterogeneousNetwork Embedding via Visual Analytics was accepted by Computer Graphics Forum (CGF) 2025. Congrat to Yun, Xiyuan, Laixin and WeChat Tencent Team. Jan. 2025: Two full papers were accepted by ACM CHI 2025. Congrat to Yuansong and Xiyuan. Jan. 2025: One poster was accepted by IEEE VR 2025. Congrat to Xiaofeng, Jiahe, and Shuhao. News in 2024 Dec. 2024: Four full papers were accepted by ACM IUI 2025. Congrat to Xiyuan, Ruofei, Qianyu, Shengxi and Longfei. Nov. 2024: Two full papers were accepted by Chinese CHI 2024 and one paper received Best Paper Award. Congrat to Yuchen and Yuansong. Oct. 2024: One full paper Deciphering Explicit and Implicit Features for Reliable, Interpretable, and Actionable User Churn Prediction in Online Video Games was accepted by TVCG 2024. Congrat to Xiyuan, Laixin and NetEase Game. Oct. 2024: One full paper Benchmarking machine learning methods for synthetic lethality prediction in cancer was accepted by Nature Communication. Congrat to He, Yang and Prof. Jie Zheng's team. Aug. 2024: One full paper was accepted by ACM UIST 2024. Congrat to Yang, Leixian, and Yun. July 2024: Two full papers were accepted by IEEE VIS 2024 and Two full papers were recommended to TVCG Fast-Track. One short paper was accepted by IEEE VIS 2024. Congrat to Haoran, Shuhao, Shaohan and Ouyang. Congrat to Prof. Haipeng Zeng's group. May 2024: One full paper - KMTLabeler: An Interactive Knowledge-Assisted Labeling Tool for Medical Text Classification is accepted by TVCG 2024 Congrat to He, Yang, Yuchen, and Fudan University Zhongshan Hospital Team April 2024: One full paper - FMLens: Towards Better Scaffolding the Process of Fund Manager Selection in Fund Investments is accepted by TVCG 2024 Congrat to Longfei, He, Xiyuan, and Prof. Haipeng Zhang and Prof. Suting Hong April 2024: One full paper - MARLens: Understanding Multi-agent Reinforcement Learning for Traffic Signal Control via Visual Analytics is accepted by TVCG 2024 Congrat to Prof. Haipeng Zeng's team April 2024: One full paper - EVCSeer: An Exploratory Study on Electric Vehicle Charging Stations Utilization via Visual Analytics is accepted by IEEE Computer Graphics and Applications 2024 Congrat to Prof. Haipeng Zeng's team News in 2023 Dec 2023: One full paper - BiasEye: A Bias-Aware Real-time Interactive Material Screening System for Impartial Candidate Assessment is accepted by ACM IUI 2024 Congrat to Qianyu, Haoran, Qiushi, and Prof. Peng Sep 2023: One full paper - Exploring Hero Drafting in Professional MOBA Tournaments is accepted by Auto-Insight Recommendation in Exploratory Data Analysis @ ACM IUI 2021 ESIDA Mar 2021: Join ShanghaiTech as a tenure-track assistant professor News in 2020 Aug 2020: Visual Analytics for Scheduling Customized Shuttle Buses @ IEEE VIS 2020 Short Paper Mar 2020: Fostering Engagement in Technology-Mediated Stress Management via Biofeedback Design @ International Journal of Human-Computer Studies (IJHCS) Feb 2020: Friend Circle as Gatekeeper in WeChat @ Chinese CHI 2020 Dec 2019: MaraVis for Managing Medical Encounters in Urban Marathon @ CHI 2020 Address: School of Information Science and Technology, ShanghaiTech 393 Middle Huaxia Road Pudong, Shanghai, 201210 Quan Li I am a tenure-track assistant professor at School of Information Science and Technology, ShanghaiTech University, also affiliated with Fintech Initiative and HCI Initiative, SIST, ShanghaiTech University. I am serving as the Co-Director (èåä¸­å¿ä¸»ä»») of Visual and Data Intelligence Center (VDI), SIST, ShanghaiTech University this period. I received my Ph.D. at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST), where my supervisors are Prof. Xiaojuan Ma and Prof. Huamin Qu. Before joining HKUST, I was a senior researcher at NetEase Games, a leading Chinese game operator.
